content.rendered: “Sit peacefully and cherish each taste of this beautiful spiced Bodhi Tea. Focus on your body, how it feels as the warmth travels from your mouth to the rest of your body, wrapping around you and embracing you like a warm hug. Feel a soothing, calming sensation along your nerves and a sense of peace in your heart.”
